summary: Tweaks the Flame, Frost and Lightning Cloak graphics so that you are not blinded.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Easier on the Eyes[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]Reduces cloak spell graphic effects, improving visibility.[/size][/center]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Background[/heading][/color]
Cloak spells are very useful but I found that I didn't use them often because they always obscured my vision.

This is a very simple tweak to the meshes used for the Flame, Frost, Lightning and Poison Cloak spells, reducing the opacity and brightness.

[list]
[*]See better in both first person and third person views.
[*]Affects flame, frost, lightning, and poison cloaks.
[/list]
[youtube]Dia-8-FBeVw?t[/youtube]
Many thanks to izon87604. Skip ahead to 1:17 if you like.
[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]No requirements or dependencies whatsoever.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Simply compatible with everything.
[*]No known conflicts.
[*]Load order should not matter.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Game Safe[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]No impact to FPS or save game size.
[*]No scripts.
[*]No ESP, so doesn't count as a plugin
[*]Safely and easily remove at any time.
[/list]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Other Great Mods from Jaxonz[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583]Positioner[/url]: The decorator's most powerful tool to accurately and easily move/copy/scale any object in-game.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335]Renamer[/url]: Easily rename objects, equipment, containers, people, creatures, horses, pets, player homes, and just about anything.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52927]Smart Looter[/url]: Automatically gathers the good stuff and leaves the junk, allowing you to focus on the adventure.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53641]Blink Teleport[/url]: Amazingly powerful and fun! Blip to anywhere in the blink of an eye.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55474]Lights Please[/url]: Easily use magical lighting spells without disarming.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53365]Archery Focus[/url]: Automatically helps you aim when using bows and crossbows.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53268]Archery Perks[/url]: Adds tracer shots and automated arrow collection to the archery perk tree.
[/list]
All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz

files.name: Subtle Cloaks
files.changelogHtml:
Added reduced graphics for Frost Cloak
Added reduced graphics for Lightning Cloak
Renamed mod and updated description
